info.title: MyTree Enviros API
info.description: API documentation for MyTree Enviros - Tree Sponsorship, Adoption & E-commerce Platform

post.description: Register a new user with phone number and send OTP for verification
Sign in with phone number and receive OTP
Verify OTP code and authenticate user
Resend OTP code to user's phone number
Logout user and revoke tokens (for mobile) or invalidate session (for web)

get.description: Get authenticated user's profile information
Get paginated list of blogs with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search blogs by title or short description

get.description: Get detailed blog data
Get a paginated list of active campaigns with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by campaign name or description

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific campaign
Retrieve the authenticated user's shopping cart with all items

delete.description: Remove all items from the shopping cart

post.description: Add a tree, product, or campaign to the shopping cart

422.description: Validation error or item not available

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the cart

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the shopping cart

get.summary: Get all FCM tokens for authenticated user
get.description: Get all FCM tokens for the authenticated user.

post.description: Store or update FCM token for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Delete FCM token by token string
post.description: Delete FCM token by token string.

delete.summary: Delete all FCM tokens for authenticated user
delete.description: Delete all FCM tokens for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve list of all active locations with optional parent filtering
Retrieve all top-level locations (without parent)
Retrieve a specific location with its details
Retrieve all child locations of a specific location

get.summary: Get available tree count for location
get.description: Get count of available trees in a specific location
Get paginated list of authenticated user's orders with optional filters

post.description: Create a new order from items in the shopping cart

422.description: Validation error or cart is empty

post.description: Create an order directly without adding to cart first

422.description: Validation error or item not available

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific order
Get all trees sponsored or adopted by the authenticated user

422.description: Only pending orders can be cancelled

post.description: Initiate Razorpay payment for an order
Verify Razorpay payment signature and update order status
Webhook endpoint for Razorpay payment notifications (called by Razorpay servers)

get.description: Get the payment status for a specific order
Get paginated list of all active products with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search products by name, botanical name, or nick name

parameters.name: in_stock
parameters.description: Filter by stock availability (1=in stock, 0=out of stock)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific product
Get all products in a specific category
Get all variants of a specific product
Get list of featured/recommended products
Returns a list of sliders for the homepage. Active-only by default.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Filter by active status (true/false). Defaults to true.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned sliders (1-100).

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order by ID (asc or desc). Defaults to desc.

get.description: Show a single slider by ID.
Get paginated list of all active trees with optional filters and search
Get detailed information about a specific tree
Get all trees available for sponsorship with optional filters
Get all trees available for adoption with optional filters
Get all pricing plans available for a specific tree
Retrieve the authenticated user's wishlist with all items

delete.description: Remove all items from the user's wishlist

post.description: Add a product or product variant to the user's wishlist

422.description: Validation error or item already in wishlist

message.example: This item is already in your wishlist

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the user's wishlist

post.description: Move a product from wishlist to shopping cart

get.summary: Check if product is in wishlist
get.description: Check if a specific product or variant is in the user's wishlist
